extendedInfo.description: SAMURAI SHODOWN II, the sword-based fighting game masterpiece has finally cut its way to Android devices!Slash the powerful adversaries standing in your path, and put a stop to Mizuki Rashojin's evil ambitions!Features:* The fan favourite installment in SNK's highly acclaimed series!The 2nd episode of the SAMURAI SHODOWN Series, is still beloved by fans of the series all across the world.Preserving the charm of the first game, its sequel brings the characters, world, and game system to the next level.* An incredible cast of 15 charismatic master swordmen head to the battlefield in order to fulfill their destiny.Haohmaru, Nakoruru, Ukyo Tachibana, Hanzo Hattori, Jubei Yagyu, and the rest of the 11 original characters return.Genjuro Kibagami, Cham Cham, Neinhalt Sieger, and Nicotine Caffeine come into play to complete the cast as the newcomers!* A new and expanded move list! Disarm your rivals by unleashing a Weapon Smash Attack!Forward Somersault, Backward Flip, Crouch, and even more moves have been added. A Weapon Smash can be performed when your Rage Gauge reaches its MAX!Finesse, or brute force? Let your hidden techniques express your fighting style!* A perfect port of this NEOGEO classic, adding new features for an even better experience!In addition to the original 4 button arcade experience,  a 6 button layout and SP button allow you to easily pull off  strong slashes and special moves by simply using the Touch Screen!* Challenge your friends via Bluetooth!Dual with your friends in a match through Bluetooth Multiplayer Mode!

reviews.title: Now works perfect!!
reviews.comment: I was a one star rater at first when it kept force closing.. great job to the snk development team for quickly fixing the bugs.. this game is heaven.. I\'m very satisfied with customer support and game experience.. every classic arcade gamer must have..!! : )
reviews.author: Chris White

reviews.title: Old favorite
reviews.comment: Plays well on Samsung GS2 phone. Really well for a fighter on a small touch screen.   After Android update working perfectly on my Nexus 7. Thank you!
reviews.author: Trey Huzarevich

reviews.title: Update: Crashing fixed
reviews.comment: A much better decision to let this game operate independently of USB debugging. Very solid port, and it works wonderfully with Xperia Play controls. My only peeve now is that it uses Scoreloop when Google has a more versatile, more popular gaming platform.
reviews.author: Elatia Langford

reviews.title: Solid port that needs polish
reviews.comment: Great to have Bluetooth multilayer. Controller support is pretty substandard. (every config maps light kick to L3!) a simple button mapping option would solve this. Needs a basic training mode. The cpu can be pretty unforgiving. Hope it sees more updates. Great game.
reviews.author: Marc Barnes

reviews.title: confused
reviews.comment: Why are there AB and CD buttons in configuration but not on screen?
reviews.author: Ted Jiang

reviews.title: Solid.
reviews.comment: Works fine now on my HTC One X and Nexus 7.
reviews.author: Thomas Morffew

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Im dreaming! This game is what ive been waiting all my life. And now with easy specials. Yes! Thanks SNK
reviews.author: arul rodriguez

reviews.title: En garde!
reviews.comment: Great! Works perfectly on my nexus 7, action is smooth and no crashes or control issues. Impossible to play using 4 bttn config on touch so be sure to choose 6 button config. Dropped 1 star for lazy use of 3rd party scoring system. I desire total integration to the point of it being unnoticeable, not crappy grey and blue boxes everywhere, it looks amateurish.
reviews.author: Chris Bannister

reviews.title: doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I was excited about downloading it but it wont load, major let down
reviews.author: Carter Phan

reviews.title: B
reviews.comment: Please make the button more visible to the eyes..., so i can see...
reviews.author: Jong Han

reviews.title: Screen rubbing game (POOR)
reviews.comment: If you like a game where you aimlessly rub both your thumbs on the screen as if they were nipples, this is the game for you.  In this game the buttons disappear completely from the screen a few seconds after the match begins.  You don\'t know what you are pressing.  The default button settings are TOO LARGE and the adjusted button settings is TOO SMALL at the very max.  That truly is a tease in the face.  9 Dollars wasted...
reviews.author: Sam Ahn

reviews.title: Needs online
reviews.comment: Great game, would be worth the money if it had online. Game is 5* but overpriced without online.
reviews.author: Tom Jenkinson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works very well on my nexus 4 Love this game and I hope they will bring another king of fighters soon as well.
reviews.author: Jefferson Moreira

reviews.title: Better Moga support
reviews.comment: Can\'t really change the button layout using a Moga controller. There is also a slight delay when I\'m pressing buttons
reviews.author: Donnie Ace

reviews.title: Mess of buttons on galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Unplayable
reviews.author: Anti Monitor

reviews.title: I stand corrected, big buttons fixed
reviews.comment: The big button bug that plagues other snk games on the HTC one is fixed on this game but it initially sets the button size to ridiculously huge, there is a slider at the top of the button config that can make them a lot smaller, thank god. 5 stars.
reviews.author: John McNichol

reviews.title: Won\'t even start.
reviews.comment: Installed but won\'t even start. No force close nothing. Galaxy Note 2 N7100. Big let down.
reviews.author: BJ Silverbolt

reviews.title: Does not launch - can not be rooted!
reviews.comment: This game does not launch and USB debugger mode is turned off. Sony Xperia S, rooted, fw 4.0.4. And do not work on my tablet (Acer Iconia, rooted, fw 4.1.1). When I uninstall the superuser privileges, it is work well.  Do not just disable the USB debugging, can not be rooted!
reviews.author: Felipe Gon\303\247alves da Rocha

reviews.title: NeoGeo goodness!
reviews.comment: Warning! It\'s all there but you MUST do an immediate button configuration and check the Help section BEFORE playing. Sorta weird that its setup like that but oh well. Awesomeness awaits beyond the option screens.
reviews.author: TheZombie4u

reviews.title: Crashes on Xperia Play
reviews.comment: Given the track record of DotEmu ports I was expecting this to be as good as Blazing Star or Metal Slug. Hopefully this will be fixed soon.
reviews.author: Joaqu\303\255n Miralles Delgado
